channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Maintaining the Space Edge: Strategic Reforms for U.S. Dominance in Low Earth Orbit
item.description: LEO constellations are one of the most critical and cutting edge components of digital infrastructure and without immediate strategic reforms, the United States risks losing its lead to China.

item.title: Practical H-1B Reforms to Serve U.S. Economic Interests
item.description: A new CSIS brief analyzes recent H-1B visa reforms, warning that steep fee increases risk undermining U.S. competitiveness. It outlines evidence-based policy alternatives to align immigration with Washington's economic and strategic goals.
